front.title: General Security Considerations for Cryptoassets Custodians

abstract.t: This document discusses the technical and operational risks of cryptoassets custodians and its security controls to avoid the unintended transactions for its customers.
This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC.
Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/cgtf/draft-crypto-assets-security-considerations.
